mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, A.* FROM (SELECT F.FAQ_NUM, Q.QNA_CATEGORY_NAME, F.TITLE, F.CONTENTS FROM FAQ F, QNA_CATEGORY Q WHERE f.qna_category_num = q.qna_category_num ORDER BY f.faq_num) A) WHERE R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT F.FAQ_NUM , Q.QNA_CATEGORY_NAME , F.TITLE, F.CONTENTS FROM FAQ F, QNA_CATEGORY Q WHERE f.qna_category_num = q.qna_category_num AND f.faq_num = #{faq_num}
